<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[False Death Vial](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2106)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 93 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to  explorer's clothing  (or another item in the unarmored defense category)

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You would be reduced to 0 Hit Points by damage but not immediately killed

**Requirement** You are unarmored.
</row>

</column>

---

This tiny crystal vial of oily liquid is typically attached to a pin or worn on a tether attached to the affixed article of clothing. When you Activate the vial, you avoid being knocked out and remain at 1 Hit Point, your [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) condition increases by 1, and the talisman casts [_drop dead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=92) on you. You and any items you're wearing and holding are instantly transported from your current space to a clear space of your choice within 30 feet. You take no damage from the triggering effect. If you are carrying another creature (even one contained inside an [extradimensional](/Traits.aspx?ID=67) container), it's left behind in your original space.

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 16"
pfs="Standard"
>
False Death Vial (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 93 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 2,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The talisman teleports you to a clear space of your choice that you can see within 120 feet. This also transports any items you're wearing and holding with you, as well as up to one other creature currently in contact with you—including if you're carrying it in an [extradimensional](/Traits.aspx?ID=67) container. This effect has the [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156) trait.
name: False Death Vial (Greater)
